thread.title: Cute little hotel for last minute overnight stay with friends
thread.title_full: Cute little hotel for last minute overnight stay with friends - Review of The Gatsby Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Candace C
title: Cute little hotel for last minute overnight stay with friends
text: I booked this hotel last minute to stay over downtown after a music show and got a great price like 100 dollars because it was day of. The location is great and the room was clean modern and hado a street view out the window. Cool clean spot for budget stay near lots of bars etc downtown. My rating reflects the outstanding value for the price. This is a basic place but clean and safe.
